definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: He lay huddled in a corner.
sentences.chinese: 他把身体缩成一团躺在角落里。

sentences.english: He lay huddled up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 他躺在床上，蜷缩成一团。

sentences.english: The cat huddled itself on the cushion.
sentences.chinese: 猫将身子缩成一团睡在椅垫上。

sentences.english: The little girl huddles herself up.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩把身子缩成一团。

sentences.english: He lay huddled amongst his blankets in bed, his knees almost touching his chin.
sentences.chinese: 他用毛毯裹着在床上缩成一团，膝盖几乎碰着下巴。

sentences.english: He was very cold, so he huddled up against his brother in bed.
sentences.chinese: 他很冷，因此他在床上缩成一团紧偎着他哥哥。

sentences.english: The child huddled himself up on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩子将身子缩成一团睡在沙发椅上。

sentences.english: It curled up and writhed about painfully, then quickly sank to the bottom, dead as a doornail.
sentences.chinese: 虫子缩成一团，痛苦的挣扎两下后，就沉到杯底死了。

sentences.english: He turned his baleful glare on the cowering suspect.
sentences.chinese: 他歹毒地盯着那个蜷缩成一团的嫌疑犯。

sentences.english: Frightened, she shrank down into her seat.
sentences.chinese: 她害怕地在座椅上缩成一团。

sentences.english: A hedgehog rolls itself into a ball when attacked.
sentences.chinese: 刺猬一受到攻击就蜷缩成一团。

sentences.english: The cat scrunched up to sleep.
A big dad can easily become smaller for his beloved daughter.
sentences.chinese: 为了他心爱的女儿，高大的爸爸可以轻易地缩成一团。

sentences.english: Dogs and cats can actually curl up in a ball when they sleep.
sentences.chinese: 其实你们狗儿猫儿睡觉时可是盘缩成一团。

sentences.english: She huddled inside the porch as she rang the bell.
sentences.chinese: 她按门铃时身子在门廊里缩成一团。

definition: to curl up (like a scroll)/to huddle/Melania libertina/wriggle (as a worm)
to curl up shivering (from cold)/timid and trembling (in fear)/to shrink/to cower
to curl up/to lie with knees drawn up/to huddle up
